snippet: Human Rights Watch says that a staff member received repeated threats this week of an attack focused on her pregnancy.
abstract: Human Rights Watch says Tanya Lokshina, staff member in Moscow, has received repeated threats of an attack focused on her pregnancy; group calls it the latest example of escalating pressure against rights and civic groups in Russia.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch says that a staff member received repeated threats this week of an attack focused on her pregnancy.

headline.seo: Human Rights Watch Says Its Moscow Researcher Threatened
headline.main: Rights Group Says Its Researcher in Moscow Is Threatened

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
